maml:description.maml:para: Adds a role assignment to a principal.
The Add-SPRoleAssignment cmdlet adds a permission to a principal (User or Group).

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the user ID or group ID.
Indicates the role definition ID.
Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the list item ID.
Indicates the user ID or group ID.
Indicates the role definition ID.
Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the list item ID.
Indicates the user ID or group ID.
Indicates the role definition ID.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Adds site read permission to the principal.
Adds list contribute permission to the principal.
Adds list full control permission to the principal.

maml:description.maml:para: Connects to SharePoint Online.
The Connect-SPOnline cmdlet creates new connection to SharePoint Online.

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the authorization endpoint URL. This parameter is provided for some environment. (Germany, China, and US Government)
Indicates the credential (user name and password).
Indicates the site URL.
Indicates the authorization endpoint URL. This parameter is provided for some environment. (Germany, China, and US Government)
Indicates the site URL.
If specified, gets the admin consent URL.
Indicates the authorization endpoint URL. This parameter is provided for some environment. (Germany, China, and US Government)
Indicates the credential (user name and password).
Indicates the site URL.
If specified, gets the admin consent URL.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Connects to SharePoint Online with device code.
Connects to SharePoint Online with user name and password.
Gets the admin consent URL.

maml:description.maml:para: Connects to SharePoint Server.
The Connect-SPServer cmdlet creates new connection to SharePoint Server. (On-premiss)

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the credential (user name and password).
Indicates the site URL.
Indicates the credential (user name and password).
Indicates the site URL.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Connects to SharePoint Server with user name and password.

maml:description.maml:para: Lists role assignments.
The Find-SPRoleAssignment cmdlet retrieves all role assignments.

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the property name collection used for sorting.
Indicates number which ignores the first N objects and then gets the remaining objects.
Indicates number which selecting only the first N objects of the collection.
Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the list item ID.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the property name collection used for sorting.

Indicates number which selecting only the first N objects of the collection.

Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the list item ID.
Indicates the property name collection used for sorting.
Indicates number which ignores the first N objects and then gets the remaining objects.
Indicates number which selecting only the first N objects of the collection.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Lists site role assignments.
Lists list role assignments.
Lists list item role assignments.

maml:description.maml:para: Lists role definitions.
The Find-SPRoleAssignment cmdlet retrieves all role definitions.

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the property name collection used for sorting.
Indicates number which ignores the first N objects and then gets the remaining objects.
Indicates number which selecting only the first N objects of the collection.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the property name collection used for sorting.

Indicates number which selecting only the first N objects of the collection.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Lists role definitions.

maml:description.maml:para: Gets a role assignment.
The Get-SPRoleAssignment cmdlet retrieves the role assignment which matches the parameter.

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the user ID or group ID.
Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the list item ID.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the user ID or group ID.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the list item ID.
Indicates the user ID or group ID.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the site role assignment by principal ID.
Gets the list role assignment by principal ID.
Gets the list item role assignment by principal ID.

maml:description.maml:para: Gets a role definition.
{{Fill in the Description}}

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the role definition ID, name or type.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the role definition ID, name or type.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the role definition by role definition ID.
Gets the role definition by role definition name.
Gets the role definition by role definition type.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a new role definition.
The New-SPRoleDefinition cmdlet adds a new role definition to the site.

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the role definition base permissions.
Indicates the role definition description.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the role definition name.
Indicates the role definition base permissions.
Indicates the role definition description.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the role definition name.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates a new role definition to the site.

maml:description.maml:para: Removes a role assignment from a principal.
The Remove-SPRoleAssignment cmdlet removes a permission from a principal (User or Group).

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the user ID or group ID.
Indicates the role definition ID.
Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the list item ID.
Indicates the user ID or group ID.
Indicates the role definition ID.
Indicates the list ID or title.
Indicates the list item ID.
Indicates the user ID or group ID.
Indicates the role definition ID.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Removes site read permission from the principal.
Removes list contribute permission from the principal.
Removes list full control permission from the principal.

maml:description.maml:para: Removes a role definition.
The Remove-SPRoleDefinition cmdlet removes a role definition from the site.

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the role definition ID, name or type.
Indicates the role definition ID, name or type.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Removes the role definition from the site.

maml:description.maml:para: Updates a role definition.
The Update-SPRoleDefinition cmdlet updates the role definition property.

maml:Description.maml:para: Indicates the role definition ID, name or type.
Indicates the role definition base permissions.
Indicates the role definition description.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the role definition name.
If specified, returns the updated object.
Indicates the role definition base permissions.
Indicates the role definition description.
Indicates the property name collection to include in the result object.
Indicates the role definition name.
If specified, returns the updated object.
Indicates the role definition ID, name or type.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates a role definition.
